tool.name: metaQuantome: download
tool.command: mkdir -p data && metaquantome db $databases --dir data && tar --create --file $outfile data
tool.help:
metaQuantome db ===================
This module downloads the required databases and stores them in a single file, which can then be accessed by the rest of the metaQuantome modules.
Questions, Comments, Problems, Kudos ------------------------------------
Please file any issues at https://github.com/galaxyproteomics/tools-galaxyp/issues.`
